primary.rationale: Barrett's business model is project-based. Website is a pitch tool for cold outreach and referral validation.

secondary.metric: Time on site from email clicks
secondary.rationale: Barrett does cold outreach - site validates his pitch
Transition from 'Barrett the photographer' to 'Playground Studios'

site_goals.conversion_action: Submit contact form → Book discovery call

architecture_strategy.rationale: For creative production services, the work IS the product. Portfolio must be the hero. Everything else supports the portfolio.
architecture_strategy.implication: They're comparing options. Show why Playground is the right choice. Don't educate on 'why you need content.'

loading_experience.purpose: Create memorable first impression, establish brand personality before content loads

behavior.trigger: First visit to homepage (session-based, not every page load)
behavior.dismissal: Auto-dismiss after animation completes OR click anywhere to skip

visual_direction.concept: Animated typographic/ASCII-style intro featuring 'Playground Studios' logo or brand mark
visual_direction.style: Generative text animation - characters morph/shift to reveal brand name
visual_direction.reference: DVTK's ASCII matrix animation that morphs into readable content

technical_notes.implementation: CSS animations with JavaScript for character randomization, or GSAP for more control
technical_notes.performance: Must not delay content load - run animation while content loads in background

loading_experience.rationale: Client specifically requested DVTK-style loading intro. Adds 'wow factor' and differentiates from generic portfolio sites. Supports 'mature playfulness' brand direction.

primary.intent: Validate sender's credibility, see work quality

secondary.intent: Explore beyond social, see full portfolio

pages.name: Home
pages.purpose: Orient visitors, establish credibility, route to portfolio or contact

pages.name: Work
pages.purpose: Showcase portfolio, prove capability, build desire

children.name: [Project Name]
children.purpose: Deep dive into specific project, show process and results

pages.name: About
pages.purpose: Humanize the brand, share origin story, build connection

pages.name: Services
pages.purpose: Clarify offerings, help self-qualify, address 'what do they do?' question

internal_linking.strategy: Every page routes to Contact. Work is always one click away.

patterns.rationale: Primary paths: see work or start conversation
Liked the story? See the work or start talking
See examples of service or inquire

projects.note: Barrett will manage routine updates post-launch

local_seo.note: Don't highlight the move, just be present in both markets

rationale_notes.why_no_blog: Not a priority for launch. Barrett's content discovery happens through social and outreach, not SEO. Can add later.
rationale_notes.why_no_pricing_page: Custom pricing per project. Contact form qualifies leads. Stating '$5K minimum' or ranges can happen on Services or Contact.
rationale_notes.why_simple_nav: Creative studios live and die by their portfolio. Keep navigation minimal so work is the focus.
